code-runner.executorMap.cpp: $oldPath = $env:PATH; try {cd $dir; if ($?) {$env:PATH = "$oldPath;D:\w64devkit\bin;D:\allegro\bin"}; if ($?) {$source = Get-ChildItem -Filter '*.cpp' -File | Select-Object -ExpandProperty FullName}; if ($?) {g++ $source -o program.exe -I D:\allegro\include -L D:\allegro\lib -lallegro -lallegro_primitives -lallegro_image -lallegro_color -lallegro_font -lallegro_ttf -lallegro_audio -lallegro_acodec -lallegro_video -lallegro_dialog -lallegro_physfs -lallegro_memfile}; if ($?) {.\program.exe}} finally {$env:PATH = $oldPath}
